title: When is double chests and bad luck protection going live?

embed.description: Lead Producer New001 gives an update on Runes Reforged, changes to leveling, details of the Runes transition plan, and more! Learn more about the changes to Leveling and Rewards: http://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/2017/09/upcoming-changes-to-leveling-ip-rewards Timestamps: 0:00 - Intro/Runes Reforged Update 1:20 - Leveling and Rewards Changes 3:41 - What's happening to my current Runes?

body: To offset the disenchant rate changes, we’re going to change the way loot chests work so you’ll have a chance to get two drops in each chest. Get ready for chests inside of your chests. We’ll also add “bad luck protection,” so you won’t ever go on long streaks without getting a skin shard or a gemstone from chests.

replies.body: I believe most of these changes are taking place in the preseason!
